## Quantum Magic and Multi-Partite Entanglement in the Structure of Nuclei

Motivated by the Gottesman-Knill theorem, [we](https://www.physik.uni-bielefeld.de/~crobin/) present a detailed study of the [quantum complexity of p-shell and sd-shell nuclei](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2409.12064).
